markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Noxious Jerkin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=646)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 2,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Padded Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 resilient [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3)_ is woven from many strands of gut cord strung with dried organs and preserved [xulgath](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) scent glands. When worn, it infuses your body with a ghastly and nauseating flavor.

<document level="2" id="action-497" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Noxious Jerkin
